chapters.title: Chapter 13:  Rumors
chapters.info: Davram t'Ghaline Bashere, p. 231 (202)—Lord of Bashere, Tyr, and Sidonia; Guardian of the Blightborder; Defender of the Heartland; Marshal-General to Queen Tenobia of Saldaea; and her uncle. He is Faile's father. Faile (or, as her parents named her, Zarine) did not tell Perrin who her father really was at first, because she was afraid he would not understand. See also Bashere, Faile; Bashere, Zarine; Kazadi, Tenobia si Bashere.
